title: New Data Show Consumers Increasingly Choose Products in Sustainable Packaging - Packaging Strategies
summary: The 2023 Buying Green Report by Trivium Packaging reveals a rising demand for sustainable packaging among consumers, with 82% willing to pay more despite inflation. Younger consumers, particularly, show a strong preference for eco-friendly options, increasing the need for clarity in sustainability claims. Trivium emphasizes the importance of educating consumers about their purchases and the environmental impact. The report, based on a survey of over 9,000 consumers across various regions, highlights a clear trend towards sustainability in consumer preferences.

title: Harpe Bioherbicide Solutions, Inc. Closes New Investment Round, Including ADM - PR Newswire
summary: Harpe Bioherbicide Solutions, Inc. announced a $10.5 million funding round to advance its natural herbicide formulations and herbicide-tolerant row crop systems. The investment will help develop new, sustainable herbicide options for organic and regenerative agriculture, addressing weed resistance while reducing reliance on synthetic chemicals.
